name: Clay Cab
description:
Feedback is appreciated!

Driving a clay cab. Bring passengers home. 

Petrol is getting expensive so try to use the landscape to save some. 

Controls:

Arrow left/right

Arrow down = pick up customer

Arrow up = change hill/climb

F10 - Fullscreen

Music:

Acoustic Guitar 1 by Audionautix

Southern California by Riot

Moonshine Town by JR Tundra
